About me

Brandon Rodríguez Fernández is a dedicated DevOps Engineer based in Alajuela, La Ceiba, Costa Rica, with a strong background in Information Technology and a focus on Engineering Systems. With a proven track record in managing cloud infrastructure, automating daily tasks, and ensuring high availability, Brandon has excelled in roles at leading companies like DXC, IBM, Citi Bank, and VMware. His expertise includes skills in Kubernetes, Openshift, Ansible, Terraform, Bash scripting, and a range of cloud and automation tools. As a Certified Kubernetes Administrator and HashiCorp Certified Terraform Associate, Brandon is committed to delivering timely, effective solutions and maintaining secure, reliable, and scalable infrastructures.
